languages.text: {n}Стоит вам взяться за обвитый медью провод, как пальцы и запястье пронзает жгучая боль. Мир на мгновение становится очень ярким, а затем погружается в сумрак.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Стоит только взяться за обвитый медью провод, как тело охватывает боль — будто тысячи острейших скальпелей пронзают ваши ткани, заставляя разжать пальцы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит вам взяться за обвитый медью провод, как пальцы и запястье пронзает жгучая боль. Мир на мгновение становится очень ярким, а затем погружается в сумрак.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as you touch the coppered wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls upon it.{/n}
{n}As soon as you touch the coppered wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls upon it.{/n}
{n}As soon as you touch the coppered wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls upon it.{/n}
{n}As soon as you touch the coppered wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls upon it.{/n}
{n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}
{n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sobald du den kupferüberzogenen Draht berührst, durchfährt ein brennender Schmerz deine Finger und dein Handgelenk. Die Welt wird eine Sekunde lang strahlend hell, dann wird sie in tiefe Dunkelheit gestürzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sobald du den Kupferdraht berührst, durchfährt ein brennender Schmerz deine Finger und dein Handgelenk. Die Welt wird eine Sekunde lang strahlend hell, dann wird sie in tiefe Dunkelheit gestürzt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À peine avez-vous touché le câble gainé de cuivre qu'une douleur cuisante vous traverse le poignet et les doigts. L'espace d'un instant, le monde s'éclaire d'une intense lumière, puis l'obscurité retombe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À peine avez-vous touché le câble de cuivre qu'une douleur cuisante vous traverse le poignet et les doigts. L'espace d'un instant, le monde s'éclaire d'une intense lumière, puis l'obscurité retombe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你刚刚碰到铜线，就感觉手指和手腕传来一阵灼痛。整个世界都变得无比明亮，随后迅速暗了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚刚碰到铜线，就感觉手指和手腕传来一阵灼痛。整个世界都变得无比明亮，随后迅速暗了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}銅でコーティングされたケーブルに触れると、たちまち焼けつく痛みがあなたの指と手首に走った。世界が数秒まばゆく光り、それから闇が訪れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}銅のケーブルに触れると、たちまち焼けつく痛みがあなたの指と手首に走る。世界が数秒まばゆく光り、それから闇が訪れる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En cuanto tocas el alambre cubierto de cobre, un dolor punzante te atraviesa los dedos y la muñeca. El mundo se vuelve muy brillante durante un segundo, y luego la oscuridad cae.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto tocas el alambre cobrizo, un dolor punzante te atraviesa los dedos y la muñeca. El mundo se vuelve muy brillante durante un segundo, y luego la oscuridad se apodera de él.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bakır kaplı kabloya dokunur dokunmaz parmaklarından bileğine doğru keskin bir acı saplanıyor. Dünyan bir anlığına göz kamaştırıyor, ardından karanlığa gömülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you touch the copper-coated wire, searing pain stabs through your fingers and wrist. The world becomes very bright for a second, and then darkness falls.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bakır kaplı kabloya dokunur dokunmaz parmaklarından bileğine doğru keskin bir acı saplanıyor. Dünyan bir anlığına göz kamaştırıyor, ardından karanlığa gömülüyor.{/n}
